thread.title: 'Satanists' fears after decapitated deer's head left at church as links made devil worshippers 'sacrifices'
thread.title_full: 'Satanists' fears after decapitated deer's head left at church as links made devil worshippers 'sacrifices'

author: Alexandra Snow
title: 'Satanists' fears after decapitated deer's head left at church as links made devil worshippers 'sacrifices'
text:
Fears are growing that 'Satanists' have struck again as a decapitated deer's head was dumped outside a church in a small New Forest village after 'sacrificial killings' 'Satanists' fears after decapitated deer's head left at church as links made devil worshippers 'sacrifices'
The decapitated deer's head was found dumped outside a church next to an upside down cross (Image: Daily Echo/Solent News )
A decapitated deer's head has been gruesomely dumped outside a church in one of the UK's most scenic national parks, sending shockwaves through the community and sparking fears that Satanists may be behind the chilling act.
The blood-curdling discovery was made outside St Theresa's Church in Totton, Hampshire, nestled in the heart of the stunning New Forest National Park.
‌
The animal's severed head was found ominously positioned next to an inverted cross, fuelling even more unease.
Police were called to the scene last week after the deer's…
Alexandra Snow
